name: St Tropez Polo
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, organic cotton knit, faux stud button detail, digital print.
Collar specifically designed for children with extreme sensory sensitivity - no collar stand, encased seams, won't  scrape against the neck.

Colours: Cream with Navy Stripe or Indian Sunset (a deep, dusty orange)

Preppy polos look fab with the Safari shorts, jean shorts and cropped jeans.

name: The Soft Sensory Tee
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless) , tagless, wide soft collar. 

Perfect for children with tactile sensitivity, this is a reinvention of the classic T shirt, now with special adaptations for comfort and style for extra sensitive dressers. 

Made with 100% Soft cotton, constructed with flat seaming (for a seamless feel), a flat, wide fit bound collar (to prevent pulling at the collar), printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Not too boxy, not too tight. Tested with children with sensory sensitivity.  Enzyme washed for an extra soft finish. 

Note: since our tees are UNISEX and some kids prefer a more fitted look, while others may prefer a roomier fit, we recommend buying either a size down (for more fitted) or size up (for roomier fit).  See our sizing chart for more information.

name: Nautical Striped Tee
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless.

Reinvention of the classic tee in timeless French nautical stripes. Now with special adaptations for extra comfort and style - made with 100% Soft cotton, constructed with flat seaming, a flat, wide fit bound collar, printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Colored with veggie dyes and enzyme washed for an extra soft finish.

name: Tony Basic Jeans
description:
Our favourite faux denim!

We've eliminated everything that is uncomfortable about jeans, without eliminating any of their inherent style. These classic fit jeans feel like a comfy pair of trackies, but look exactly like your favorite pair of jeans. With new and improved details like contrast stitching, and patch pockets, these look more real than ever! 
Our flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes, and water based digital print, makes dressing a delight. Prewashed and preshrunk for a true fit.

Tony Jeans are tailored with a roomier fit through the leg and a waistband lined with khaki fabric for no scratchy-bits.

100% Organic Cotton Denim-Like French Terry 

Care Info
MACHINE WASH COLD WITH LIKE COLORS, GENTLE CYCLE USE ONLY NON CHLORINE BLEACH WHEN NEEDED, TUMBLE DRY LOW REMOVE PROMPTLY WARM IRON AS NEEDED

name: Nautical Striped Mini
description:
GIRLS. Navy and heather stripes, flat seaming (seamless), tagless, encased elastic waist.

This skirt was made for twirling in comfort! Our Soft full skirt in silky soft striped cotton is great for layering with leggings or wearing solo in the warm summer months. The ultra-comfy encased elastic waistband, flat seaming throughout and digitally printed labels makes dress up a dream.

name: Paige Basic Jeans
description:
Our favourite faux denim!

We've eliminated everything that is uncomfortable about jeans, without eliminating any of their inherent style. These slimmer fit jeans feel like a comfy pair of trackies, but look exactly like your favorite pair of jeans. With new and improved details like contrast stitching, and patch pockets, these look more real than ever! 

Our flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes, and water based digital print, makes dressing a delight. Prewashed and preshrunk for a true fit.

Paige Jeans are tailored with a slimmer fit through the leg than previous Soft jeans (if you want a roomier fit, check out the Tony jeans). The waistband is lined with rose-pink fabric for no scratchy-bits.

100% Organic Cotton Denim-Like French Terry 

Care Info
MACHINE WASH COLD WITH LIKE COLORS, GENTLE CYCLE USE ONLY NON CHLORINE BLEACH WHEN NEEDED, TUMBLE DRY LOW REMOVE PROMPTLY WARM IRON AS NEEDED

name: Paige Romper
description:
Flat seaming and tagless design in our hand-drawn porto stripe.

Spring and Summer is for romping! Romp around in this soft organic cotton shorts romper. Flat seaming and tagless construction throughout for comprehensive comfort. 

100% Organic Cotton 

Made in Bangladesh

name: Jesse Wide-Leg Pant
description:
GIRLS

Soft organic knit, wide, encased elastic waist with front bow detail, wide leg fit. Can be worn as cropped pants or full-length.

Fabric: 100% cotton

Available in blue or yellow.
 
Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Use warm iron as needed.

name: Charlie Short Shorts
description:
GIRLS. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, thick encased elastic waist, faux slant stitched pockets, seam details, contrast trim.

Made from lightweight organic cotton. All seaming is flat-locked and the soft interlock cotton has been bio-washed for extra softness. 

The shorts that go with everything! Team them with a chic Boat Neck Tee, a tank top for cool comfort or any of the Soft Classic Tees.

name: Boatneck Long Sleeve Tee
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, wide neck.
 
Made with 100% Soft cotton, constructed with flat seaming (for a seamless feel), a flat, wide fit neck, printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Not too boxy, not too tight. Enzyme washed for an extra soft finish.
 
Available in burgundy with a navy and white stripe or blue with a white stripe.

Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Jean Shorts
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, encased elastic waist, faux stitched pockets, 'frayed' outer seams for a casual look.

Colour: Soft 'faux' Denim

Made from lightweight organic cotton. All seaming is flat-locked and the soft interlock cotton has been bio-washed for extra softness. 

The shorts that go with everything! Pair them with a classic Soft tee, a St Tropez polo for a dressier look or a tank top for cool comfort.

name: Porto Stripe Tee
description:
100% Organic Cotton Jersey Made in Bangladesh.

Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Use warm iron as needed.

name: Tunic Dress
description:
Incredibly versatile, this tunic can be worn as a dress or as a long top. And it crosses seasons! Layer with leggings for extra warmth in spring and autumn. Soft organic knit, boat-neck, three-quarter cropped sleeves

Fabric: 100% cotton
 
Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Use warm iron as needed.

Available in bright Porto stripes; red and beige Capetown Stripe; or Floral.

name: Bling Tee
description:
SALE! Originally $26, now $15!

Reinvention of the classic t-shirt with silver charms, necklaces, pearls and bow printed on the front. Now with special adaptations for extra comfort and style - made with 100% Soft cotton, constructed with flat seaming, a flat, wide fit bound collar, printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Printed with digital printing techniques and water-based ink for a smooth feel and enzyme washed for an extra soft finish.

name: Party Dress
description:
GIRLS. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, soft 'inside-out' satin collar.

Dress up without the drama - feels like a simple jersey slip, looks like an adorable (and chic) party dress. Dress it up for events, dress it down for a regular day. Layer with a cardigan or long sleeve tee for winter events. 

Flat seaming throughout (for a seamless feel) and printed label and care info (tagless). Colored with veggie dyes and enzyme washed for an extra soft finish. Elastic sateen collar on the outside for a truly seamless feel on the inside.

name: Orange Tank Top
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, soft organic cotton knit, rounded neckline, contrasting trim details.

Made from lightweight organic cotton. All seaming is flat-locked and the soft interlock cotton has been bio-washed for extra softness.   

Deep, rusty orange with a grey trim.

The Orange Tank Top looks great with the Jean Shorts, Safari Shorts, cropped denim jeans and cropped floral jeans.

name: Summer Shift Dress
description:
GIRLS. Comes in two colors, flat seaming (seamless), tagless, wide soft collar.

The versatility of this simple little A-line shift dress is amazing! Made with incredibly soft interlock cotton and a flat, wide sateen neckline, then finished with flat seaming throughout. She'll wear this comfy, swingy, slouchy dress over and over and over again. Layer with a cardigan or over Soft printed leggings for a complete look. Crewneck. Sleeveless. Hits just above the knee.

name: Floral Cropped Jeans
description:
GIRLS. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, thick encased elastic waist, faux stitched pockets. Designed to fall mid-calf length.

Made from lightweight organic cotton. All seaming is flat-locked and the soft interlock cotton has been bio-washed for extra softness. 

The floral cropped jeans look great with the Snapdragon Pink Boat Neck Tee, the Gold Tank Top or a classic Soft Sensory Tee in Gold.

name: Marseille Tee Dress
description:
Blue and white stripes for a cool nautical summer!

Made with incredibly soft interlock cotton and a flat, ribbed neckline, then finished with flat seaming throughout.
 
T-shirt length sleeves. Hits at knee.
 
Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Use warm iron as needed.

name: Borris Shorts
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, encased elastic waist and digital print whales.

These fun boating shorts are perfect for spring and summer. Made from lightweight material with a classic and playful 'Borris Prince of Whales' print. No pockets, buttons, seams or zips to bug you. All seaming is flatlocked and the soft interlock cotton has been bio-washed for extra softness.

name: Boatneck Tee
description:
Was $22, now $15.

GIRLS. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, soft organic cotton knit, boat-neck, cap sleeves.

Colours: Snapdragon Pink or Light Pink with fine White Stripe
 
Made from lightweight organic cotton (95%) and Spandex (5%) blend. All seaming is flat-locked. Bio-washed for extra softness.   

Fab worn with the Charlie Short Shorts, Cropped Jeans and Jean Shorts.

name: Ballerina Mini
description:
GIRLS. Perfect pale pink, flat seaming (seamless), tagless, encased elastic waist.

This skirt was made for twirling in comfort! Our Soft full skirt in silky soft interlock cotton is great for layering with leggings or wearing solo in the warm summer months. The ultra-comfy encased elastic waistband, flat seaming throughout and digitally printed labels makes dress up a dream.

name: Long Sleeve Soft Sensory Tee
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, wide soft collar. 

Perfect for children with tactile sensitivity, this is a reinvention of the classic T shirt - now with special adaptations for comfort and style for extra sensitive dressers. 

Made with 100% Soft cotton, constructed with flat seaming (for a seamless feel), a flat, wide fit bound collar (to prevent pulling at the collar), printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Not too boxy, not too tight. Sleeves hit at the wrist so there is no bunching up which causes extra irritation on sensitive skin. Tested with children with sensory sensitivity.  Enzyme washed for an extra soft finish. 

This style is PERFECT for layering under itchy winter clothing, creating a soft, seam free, tagless barrier between sensitive skin and itchy outer layers.

name: Classic Chino
description:
(UNISEX) Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, encased elastic waist, french terry top stitched chino details for a dressy look.

Dress up without the drama. Perfect for children with tactile sensitivity, these classic chinos have a dressy look, but feel just like a favorite old pair of trackies! Constructed with a super soft encased elastic waist, flat seaming throughout for a truly seamless feel, printed label and care info (tagless), easy pull-on (no zippers, buttons or closures) and contrast top-stitched for style without sacrificing comfort. Colored with natural dyes and enzyme washed for an extra soft finish. 

Pair with our tie print tee for a dressy occasion or wear as a school uniform bottom or for everyday.

name: Library Cardigan
description:
Time to hit the books! 

The Soft unisex Library V-Neck Cardigan is the perfect preppy addition to any outfit - just right for layering in autumn and spring or for extra warmth under a coat in winter.

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print. Features custom snaps made to look like buttons.

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. 

Available in dark navy with black trim or on-trend bright blue.

name: Tartan Long Sleeve Tee
description:
SALE! Originally $26, now $10!

Get a little punky!

Layer this tartan tee under a short sleeve tee or cardigan, or wrap it around your waist 90's grunge style. Get the classic punk/prep cool of tartan, without the itchy wool or flannel!

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes and water based digital print.

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Colour Block Printed Party Dress
description:
Inspired by Coco Chanel!

Chic, sweet and right on trend, this color-block black and white drop-waisted dress with a printed collar is the ultimate party dress. 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print, dress up without struggling with itchy seams and fussy fabrics. 

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Preppy Blazer
description:
Dress to impress in this prep school, hip blazer. Navy with white piping and an army green brushed french terry lining, this unisex style looks chic with our Soft mini and makes a dress suit out of our navy chinos! 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes, and water based digital print, dress up without struggling with itchy seams and fussy fabrics. 

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Ipswitch Long Sleeve Tee
description:
SALE! Originally $26, now $15!

(UNISEX) Drawing by Brooklyn, NY based artist, Timothy Hull - "I am inspired by patterns, phenomenon and antiquity. This particular drawing, however,was directly inspired by my 1975 Cape Dory Typhoon sailboat."

Long sleeve tee. Sailboat design printed using water based inks, on GOLD long sleeved Soft Sensory Tees, which feature flat seaming and printed labels for comprehensive comfort.

name: Long Sleeve Classic Polo
description:
Look smart in a classic preppy polo.

The Soft collar was specifically designed for children with extreme sensory sensitivity - no collar stand, encased seams and a soft, yet not floppy collar that doesn't scrape against the neck. 

Team with Soft Chinos for a dressed up look or go casual and classic with Soft jeans. 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print, dress without struggling with itchy seams, and fussy fabrics. 

Prewashed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. 

White with red tartan digital print detail.

name: Houndstooth Long Sleeve Tee
description:
SALE! Originally $26, now $10!

This ain't no typical raglan tee! Oversized Houndstooth print elevates this style from casual to runway! 

Unisex crew neck long sleeve tee is perfectly paired with our brightly hued Library Cardigan and a pair of our Soft Denim Jeans, or twirly Soft Mini! 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print, dress without struggling with itchy seams, and fussy fabrics. 

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Unisex Soft Military Jacket
description:
Reinvention of the classic army jacket in iguana green with patch front pockets and sand coloured lining. The perfect jacket for everyday, lined with brushed french terry for extra warmth. 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes and water based digital print.

Prewashed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Classic Cropped Cardigan
description:
UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, snaps custom made to look like pearl buttons. In brushed and washed french terry. 

Perfect for children with tactile sensitivity, this extra warm cardigan is perfect for layering with casual or dressy looks. Flat seaming (for a seamless feel), a soft, wide collar, easy on/off snaps custom made to look like buttons. Comfort, warmth and a classic slightly cropped bolero silhouette. Colored with veggie dyes and bio washed for an extra soft finish. 

Perfect paired with the Soft Party Dress and Seamless Dress Socks for a complete dressed up look for girls. Or, try with the chinos and Tie Tee for a formal boys look that won't cause a fuss.  

Cardigan Sizing*
Fit note: cardigans are slightly cropped and fit snug so we recommend buying one size up if your child prefers a roomier fit. Hits at the natural waist and just above the wrist.

name: Poppy Red Peacoat
description:
Reinvention of the Classic Peacoat silhouette - double breasted with a slight A-Line, slightly longer for extra warmth and a feminine twist! 

Custom ring snaps are oversized for easy on/off, and the brushed french-terry interior is super soft, warm and seam free! 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes, and water based digital print. 

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. 
100% Organic Cotton/ 100% Poly Lining with Bio Wash

name: Seamless Underwear - Unisex Briefs
description:
Entirely seamless construction. Made from the softest organic cotton belnded with Soft spandex for a gentle hugging sensation.

Soft Seamless Underwear was developed over the course of 36 months and tested on children with a wide range of sensory sensitivity. The finished design is a unique style of underwear made for comfort and style.

Soft and seamless where it counts!

Choose from a single pack (red stripes OR solid red) or three packs - go all white or choose the colour pack (one red pair, one creamy-white pair and one striped pair).

Sizing: Because of the unique fabrication, each size can accommodate a range of ages and sizes - so please take note of the specific measurements to find the best match for your child.  

Small (3-5 years) 11-17kgs, 48-56cm waist

Medium (6-8 years) 17-23kgs, 56-64cm waist

Large (9-12 years) 23-41kgs, 64-71cm waist


Please note that due to sanitary and safety issues, opened or washed underwear is not exchangeable or returnable.   We will accept unopened exchanges and returns for store credit only.

name: Tie Print Long Sleeve Tee
description:
SALE! Originally $26, now $15!

UNISEX. Flat seaming (seamless), tagless, wide soft collar, digitally printed tie.

Dress up without the drama.  Perfect for children with tactile sensitivity, this dressy-tee is designed with special adaptations for extra comfort and style. 

Made with 100% Soft cotton jersey, constructed with flat seaming throughout, a flat, wide fit bound collar, printed label and care info (tagless) and a classic t-shirt silhouette. Coloured with natural dyes and enzyme washed for an extra soft finish. The tie is digitally printed for both a soft touch and realistic 'tie look'. Shirt sleeves hit at the wrist for a neat and tailored look. 

Pair with the chinos and cardigan for a dressy boy look or go casual-cool paired with jeans.

name: Two Tone Raglan Tee
description:
Take me out to the ball game!

The Two Tone Raglan Tee is a sporty unisex baseball style tee perfect for casual wear. 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print labels. 

Prewashed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. 

Available in Grey/ Blue Danube and Grey/ Topaz.

name: Cargo Pant
description:
Get ready for some rough and tumble! These durable, patch pocket cargo pants were made for playing in comfort.

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton, AZO free dyes and water based digital print.

Made from cotton French terry. Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Drop Waist Tartan Dress
description:
A modern take on an old classic.

The Soft long-sleeve drop waist black and tartan party dress is perfectly casual and playful.

Dress it up with a hair bow and a pair of patent leather bow flats or layer with Soft black leggings for a more casual look. 

Made with flat seaming, printed labels, organic bio-washed cotton interlock, AZO free dyes and water based digital print, dress up without struggling with itchy seams and fussy fabrics. 

Pre-washed and preshrunk for a true fit. Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle use only, non chlorine bleach. When needed tumble dry low, remove promptly. Warm iron as needed.

name: Seamless Underwear - Unisex Boxers
description:
Entirely seamless construction. Made from the softest organic cotton blended with Soft spandex for a gentle hugging sensation.

Soft Seamless Underwear was developed over the course of 36 months and tested on children with a wide range of sensory sensitivity. The finished design is a unique style of underwear made for comfort and style.

Soft and seamless where it counts!

Choose from a single pack (blue stripes) or three packs - go all white or choose the colour pack (one blue pair, one creamy-white pair and one striped pair).

Sizing: Because of the unique fabrication, each size can accommodate a range of ages and sizes - so please take note of the specific measurements to find the best match for your child.  

Small (3-5 years) 11-17kgs, 48-56cm waist

Medium (6-8 years) 17-23kgs, 56-64cm waist

Large (9-12 years) 23-41kgs, 64-71cm waist


Please note that due to sanitary and safety issues, opened or washed underwear is not exchangeable or returnable.   We will accept unopened exchanges and returns for store credit only.

name: Soft Seamless Socks Two Pack
description:
Soft seamless socks - two pack (one pair navy, one pair white).

FEET HAVE FEELINGS TOO.

Soft seamless crew socks are made especially for children with extremely sensitive feet.  The hand-linked seamless toe has absolutely NO LUMPS or BUMPS.  A special machine was used to make sure Soft socks are ENTIRELY SEAMLESS.  The unique no-heel construction makes Soft socks adaptable to a range of children's sizes and sensory needs.  No need to twist and turn to find the heel of your socks! No more bulging heel pocket twisting to the top of your shoe!  Truly the softest socks you will ever feel, the Soft 'Sensory Blend' fabric combination is designed to keep feet comfy, dry and feeling good.  Our gently compressing rib top makes your feet and ankles feel secure, like they are being gently hugged.  

97% polyester, 3% spandex

Sizing:

XS = AUS shoe size 3 - 7 (US 3 - 7.5)
S = AUS shoe size 6 - 11 (US 6 - 11.5)
M = AUS shoe size 9 - 1 (US 9 - 1.5)
L = AUS shoe size 12 - 2 (US 12 - 3)**

**Sizes M and L are SOLD OUT - hopefully more stock coming soon!

name: I'll Tell You Why... I Can't Wear Those Clothes!
description:
I'LL TELL YOU WHY... I CAN'T WEAR THOSE CLOTHES!
Talking about Tactile Defensiveness

A little girl explains how it feels to be hypersensitive to certain touch sensations.  
  
Intended to be read with your child, this book explains the physical reasons your child may become emotionally overwhelmed by daily routines such as putting on socks, shoes and clothing.

The drawing journal format allows your child to express their individual needs.
